##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::Temp: DiaColloDB::Temp API
=pod

=head2 DiaColloDB::Temp API

=over 4

=item cleanup

 undef = $obj->cleanup();

Unlinks underlying file(s), only if the calling objects created with the 'UNLINK' option.
Subclasses should probably call this from their DESTROY() method.

=back

=cut
